entry.title: ZpellCatz "Great on Deck" Update (0.93.0) April '22
entry.content:
Steam Deck polish for ZpellCatz and more. You can try the changes in the new patch of the Pumpkin Prologue. Want to know what has been changed? Read on.

entry.title: ZpellCatz DevRecap Feb - April '22
entry.content:
Hey there, fellow catz! After some technical system adjustments earlier this year, I was able to make some progress with the story of ZpellCatz in the last months. Want to know more? Read on.
